lexUnit.name: tablespoon.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the amount held by a tablespoon, in the UK considered to be 15 millilitres when used as a measurement in cookery

sentence.text: Beat 100g/4oz vegetarian Stilton with 25g/1oz softened butter , one tablespoon of port , one finely chopped pear and one teaspoon of snipped chives .
1 Heat one tablespoon of the oil in a large pan , add half of the onion and garlic and fry until the onion begins to brown .
Place a tablespoon of grape mixture into the centre of each plate .
Two to three tablespoons of tinned tomatoes are enough for a sauce made from 2 lb. of the fresh fruit or for 3 pints of stock .
Then pour over eight tablespoons of lemon juice and leave to stand overnight .
Fold the pastry in half widthways , brush with milk and sprinkle over three tablespoons of freshly grated Parmesan .
Now place a generous tablespoon of filling in the centre of each pastry disc and spread slightly .
Mix tuna , kidney beans , cucumber , tomato , olives , parsley and garlic , season with salt and pepper and add about 1 tablespoon of olive oil to help combine ingredients .
Stir in the flour , add a tablespoon of the stock and cook very gently for 2-3 minutes .
Add one tablespoon of salt , two tablespoons of oil and the fettuccine .
Pound the garlic and mash it with the cod 's roe until the paste is quite smooth before gradually adding 3 tablespoons of the oil .
5 Mix the jam with one tablespoon of boiling water .
Mix two tablespoons of Greek strained yogurt and two teaspoons of horseradish sauce and divide among the mounds .
Mix one tablespoon of mayonnaise with ¼ teaspoon of creamed horseradish .
Toast the muffin and put a tablespoon of the sauce on it , together with a drip of oil , some mozzarella cheese and all the rest of the ingredients .
Put apples in a pan with three tablespoons of water , cover and cook gently until soft .
If you are using dried yeast , measure four tablespoons of the onion liquid into a small bowl and stir in half a teaspoon of caster sugar .
